title: 2 bd x 2br $1000 OFF Ask How! Pool, Gym in Warner Center
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
The gorgeous Haven Warner Center has lots to offer!
Haven Warner Center has a beautiful heated, sparkling pool and Jacuzzi.

We offer a stunning courtyard field with newly renovated BBQ area, Dog Park, Parcel Pending Lockers, Fire Pit, Fitness Studio that is open 24/7, as well as completely upgraded/remodeled studio, 1 & 2 Bedrooms.
Haven Warner Center is located near the "Orange Line", 101 Fwy and 118 Fwy.

At Haven Warner Center, you will be within close distance from Starbucks, Ralphs, Trader Joes, Target, Crate and Barrel, Macy's, Neiman Marcus, Linens and Things, The Westfield Topanga Mall, and the AMC Theatres.
Two pets are allowed per apartment.
Our apartments have hardwood type floors throughout with carpet in the bedrooms only.
Studios have only hard floors, no carpet.
Comments: $500.00 Deposit per pet Additional: $40 a month per cat and $50 a month per dog.
Short term leases are available for premium rates.
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven
Balcony/patio, Sprinkler system, Outdoor Sofa Seating Area with Fire Pit, 2 large BBQ grills and outdoor eating area., Interior Courtyard with Grass & Trees
Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Barbecue
Elevator, Security system, Controlled access, Gated entry, Disability access
Hot tub / Spa, Non-Smoking Property, Wood-Style Flooring
